# Thrive AI

Thrive AI is an AI/ML and LLM solution specialist company that specializes in providing cutting-edge AI solutions to businesses of all sizes.

## Services

- AI readiness assessment
- AI strategy and roadmap
- AI implementation and integration
- AI training and optimization
- AI governance and compliance
- AI talent and training
- AI operations and maintenance
- AI security and risk management
- AI cost optimization and ROI analysis
- AI performance monitoring and analytics

## Service Providers Used

- Anthropic
- Google
- OpenAI
- Hugging Face
- Cohere
- Gemini
- Llama
- GPT-4
